help-language: Language for Wikipedia and user interface
help-mobile-view: [Mobile mode only] Select view: graph, info or categories checkbox filter
help-categories-switch: Show/hide categories in graph. Hiding also disables categories checkbox filter.
help-checkboxfilter-switch: [Desktop mode only] Show/hide categories checkbox filter.
help-categoriesclickhover-switch: Show results categories in graph on click or hover.
help-mobile-maxresults: [Mobile mode] Adjust maximum number of results in graph.
